Object.Name: Output Filter
Object.Description1: The uCIFI Output Filter can be used to fine tune the output commands in order, for example, to achieve a prolonged fade. To be used in conjunction with a Program Scheduler.

Item.Name: Operation
Item.Description: This resource defines an operation to be performed between the value of the Control Program output and the value currently store in the LwM2M resource pointed by 'Target'. Possible operations: 1 - set 2 - min 3 - max 4 - add 5 - subtract 6 - multiply When operation or filter is not defined the default output operation is set

Item.Name: Delay
Item.Description: When defined the control output is not immediately applied and transaction time = delay is implemented between the current target resource value and the value of the control program output. This can be also associated to Fade Time in smart lighting scenario

Item.Name: Transaction
Item.Description: Defines the type of progression to occur to transition the current target resource value to the value defined by the of the control program output. Current options: 0 - Immediate 1 - linear 2 – exponential 3 – Device internal mechanism

Item.Name: Expiration Time
Item.Description: Limit the time period for which the output command should be considered valid. This is to be used in scenarios where Control Programs are not under continuous re-evaluation and for which the output control action is not continuously re-calculated. In such scenarios, the expiration time resource can be used to limit the time frame that the control output should be applied to the target resource.
